violation, offense, offence, breach, transgression, infringement, contravention
application (of an update, changes, etc.), taking effect
fanqie, traditional Chinese spelling system in which two characters are used: the first one for the onset, the second one for rhyme and tone
opposition, rebellion, revolt, resistance, backlash, refusal
to return (something), to restore, to put back
to turn over, to turn upside down, to overturn
to pay back, to retaliate, to reciprocate
to respond (with), to retort, to reply, to say back
to do ... back (e.g. speak back, throw back)
to do again, to do repeatedly
(but) on the other hand, though, although, while
to be contrary to, to be inconsistent with, to contradict
to act contrary to (rules or guidelines), to violate, to transgress
to oppose, to rebel, to revolt
opposition, resistance, insubordination, defiance, hostility, rebellion
turning around (the other way), reversal (of direction, course, etc.), inversion, flipping
producing a positive from a negative, producing a negative from a positive
violation (of the law, regulations, etc.), infringement, breach, infraction
antipathy, antagonism, animosity, revulsion, ill feeling
proof to the contrary, disproof, counter-evidence, rebuttal, refutation
to return, to come back, to go back
to become extremely, to become completely
reduction (of crop size), reduction of acreage (under cultivation)
estrangement, alienation, disaffection, desertion, defection, breakaway
variable measure of fabric (28.8 cm in width), for kimonos: at least 10 m in length, for haori: at least 7.27 m in length, for other clothes: at least 6.06 m in length
mixture of soy sauce, sugar and mirin
on the contrary, rather, instead, all the more
marks written alongside characters in a classical Chinese text to indicate their ordering when read in Japanese
turning over in one's mind, thinking over (something), pondering, musing, rumination (about a subject)
plotting to overthrow the government (by assassinating the emperor)

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑反↑↓はん↓↑社会↑↓しゃかい↓↑的↑↓てき↓かもしれないけれど↑人↑↓ひと↓と↑話↑↓はな↓さないわけではない。
sdata.e: I may be antisocial, but it doesn't mean I don't talk to people.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑目↑↓め↓は↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓を↑反映↑↓はんえい↓する↑海↑↓うみ↓である。
sdata.e: My eyes are an ocean in which my dreams are reflected.

sdata.j: あなたは↑妊娠↑↓にんしん↓↑中絶↑↓ちゅうぜつ↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですか、↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against abortions?

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えに↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですかそれとも↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against his idea?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑提案↑↓ていあん↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓か↑反対↑↓はんたい↓か。
sdata.e: Are you for or against his idea?

sdata.j: あなたは↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えに↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですか、↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against his idea?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑戦争↑↓せんそう↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓か↑反対↑↓はんたい↓か。
sdata.e: Are you for the war or against it?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑正↑↓ただ↓しいかもしれないが↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑意見↑↓いけん↓に↑反対↑↓はんたい↓する。
sdata.e: You may be right, but I am against your opinion.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑若↑↓わか↓い、それに↑反↑↓はん↓し↑私↑↓わたし↓はかなり↑年↑↓とし↓をとっている。
sdata.e: You are young. I, on the contrary, am very old.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑案↑↓あん↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですか↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against my plan?

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑計画↑↓けいかく↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですか、↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against my plan?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑法案↑↓ほうあん↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓なのか↑反対↑↓はんたい↓なのか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against the bill?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑政策↑↓せいさく↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓か↑反対↑↓はんたい↓か。
sdata.e: Are you in favor of or against that policy?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑計画↑↓けいかく↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですか、それとも↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against the plan?

sdata.j: その↑意見↑↓いけん↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですか、それとも↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against the plan?

sdata.j: この↑計画↑↓けいかく↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですか、↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against the plan?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑案↑↓あん↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓か↑反対↑↓はんたい↓か。
sdata.e: Are you in favor of the plan or not?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑提案↑↓ていあん↓にはきっと↑反対↑↓はんたい↓があるだろう。
sdata.e: There is certain to be some opposition to your suggestion.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑提案↑↓ていあん↓にあえて↑反対↑↓はんたい↓はしない。
sdata.e: I don't mean to object to your proposal.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑奥↑↓おく↓さんが↑反対↑↓はんたい↓するなんて↑驚↑↓おどろ↓きだね。
sdata.e: It is surprising that your wife should object.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓のやったことは↑規則↑↓きそく↓に↑反↑↓はん↓しているよ。
sdata.e: What you did is against the rules.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓には、↑私↑↓わたし↓たちの↑計画↑↓けいかく↓に↑反対↑↓はんたい↓する↑権利↑↓けんり↓はない。
sdata.e: You have no right to oppose our plan.

sdata.j: あなたに↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓の↑計画↑↓けいかく↓に↑反対↑↓はんたい↓する↑権利↑↓けんり↓はありません。
sdata.e: You have no right to oppose our plan.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑外出↑↓がいしゅつ↓するのには↑反対↑↓はんたい↓だ。
sdata.e: I don't approve of your going out with him.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑働↑↓はたら↓きに↑出↑↓で↓ることには↑反対↑↓はんたい↓しないけれども、↑子供↑↓こども↓↑達↑↓たち↓の↑面倒↑↓めんどう↓はどうするつもりだい。
sdata.e: I don't object to your going out to work, but who will look after the children?

sdata.j: ↑鏡↑↓かがみ↓は↑光↑↓ひかり↓を↑反射↑↓はんしゃ↓する。
sdata.e: A mirror reflects light.

sdata.j: ↑規則↑↓きそく↓↑違反↑↓いはん↓をする↑者↑↓もの↓は↑罰↑↓ばっ↓せられるだろう。
sdata.e: Those who violate the rules will be punished.

sdata.j: ↑規則↑↓きそく↓に↑違反↑↓いはん↓してはいけない。
sdata.e: You must not violate the regulations.

sdata.j: ↑喜↑↓よろこ↓びの↑反意語↑↓はんいご↓は↑悲↑↓かな↓しみです。
sdata.e: Delight is the opposite of sorrow.

sdata.j: ↑関税↑↓かんぜい↓↑引↑↓ひ↓き↑上↑↓あ↓げの↑提案↑↓ていあん↓↑国↑↓こく↓はお↑互↑↓たが↓いに↑反目↑↓はんもく↓しています。
sdata.e: Proponents of increased import duties are at odds with each other.
